```{r data generation, echo = FALSE, results = 'hide'}
## DATA GENERATION
na = sample(11:19, size = 1) 
nb = sample(11:19, size = 1) 
bar_xa = sample(50:60, size = 1) / 10
bar_xb = sample(50:60, size = 1) / 10
ss_a = sample(80:90, size = 1) * 10 
ss_b = sample(80:90, size = 1) * 10

hat_var = ss_a / (na - 1) / na + ss_b / (nb - 1) / nb
se = sqrt(hat_var)

sol_round = round(hat_var, digits = 2)
```

Question
========
We have data of an AB experiment: $\bar X_a = `r bar_xa`$, $\bar X_b = `r bar_xb`$, 
$n_a = `r na`$, $n_b = `r nb`$, $\sum (X_i^a - \bar X_a)^2 = `r ss_a`$, 
$\sum (X_i^b - \bar X_b)^2 = `r ss_b`$.

Calculate the estimate of variance of $\bar X_a - \bar X_b$ for the Welch test.

Provide the answer with 2 decimal digits.

Solution
========
